name: cogworks-azure-search
description: Abstraction and simplification way of implementation of Azure Search.

scripts.release: npm version from-git && sleep 5 && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 -n ./changelog.config.js && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "docs(changelog): regenerate CHANGELOG.md [skip ci]"

author: Cogworks
